    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Die Notlage der Flüchtlinge (Beispiel Schleswig-Holstein)</string>
            <string language="en">The Distress of the Refugees (e.g. Schleswig-Holstein)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La détresse des réfugiés (par exemple 
Schleswig-Holstein)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A aflição dos refugees (por exemplo 
Schleswig-Holstein)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'afflizione dei rifugiati (per esempio 
Schleswig-Holstein)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο κίνδυνος των προσφύγων (π.χ. Σλέσβιχ-Χολστάιν)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La señal de socorro de los refugiados (e.g. 
Schleswig-Holstein)</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Zusammenstellung statistischer Erhebungen zu Bevölkerungsdichte, Wohndichte und dem Gesundheitszustand von Flüchlingen und Stammbevölkerung in Schleswig-Holstein 1947. Fragen zu den positiven und negativen Begleiterscheinungen der Zuwanderung.<br>Interpretation der Statistik unter Berücksichtigung des Arbeitsblattes "Die Versorgungslage in Deutschland 1946".</string>
            <string language="en">Listing of statistical figures on population density, occupant density and health condition of refugees and locals in Schleswig-Holstein in 1947. Questions on positive and negative side effects of the immigration. Interpretation of the statistics in consideration of the worksheet "The Supply Situation in Germany in 1946".</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Flüchtling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Zuwanderung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Krieg</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Krankheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Statistik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Deutschland</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Refugee</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">War destruction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Illness</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Post-war period</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Germany</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Liste des figures statistiques sur la densité de
population, la densité d'occupant et l'état de santé des réfugiés
et des gens du pays en le Schleswig-Holstein en 1947. Questions 
sur des effets secondaires positifs et négatifs de l'immigration. 
Traduction des statistiques dans la considération du tableau 
"la situation d'approvisionnement en Allemagne en 1946".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lista de figuras estatísticas na densidade de 
população, na densidade do occupant e na condição da saúde dos 
refugees e dos locals em Schleswig-Holstein em 1947. Perguntas 
em efeitos laterais positivos e negativos do immigration. 
Interpretação dos statistics na consideração da folha "a 
situação da fonte em Germany em 1946".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Elenco delle figure statistiche su densità 
demografica, su densità dell'occupante e sullo stato di salute dei 
rifugiati e dei locals in Schleswig-Holstein in 1947. Domande 
sugli effetti secondari positivi e negativi di immigrazione. 
Interpretazione delle statistiche nella considerazione del 
foglio di lavoro "la situazione del rifornimento in Germania in 1946".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λίστα των στατιστικών αριθμών για την πυκνότητα 
πληθυσμών, την πυκνότητα κατόχων και τη συνθήκη υγιεινής των 
προσφύγων και των locals στο Σλέσβιχ-Χολστάιν σε 1947, 
ερωτήσεις στις θετικές και αρνητικές παρενέργειες της 
μετανάστευσης. Ερμηνεία των στατιστικών λαμβάνοντας υπόψη 
το φύλλο εργασίας "η κατάσταση ανεφοδιασμού στη Γερμανία το 
1946".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Listado de figuras estadísticas en densidad 
demogr'afica, densidad del inquilino y la condición de la salud de 
refugiados y de locals en Schleswig-Holstein en 1947. Preguntas 
sobre los efectos secundarios positivos y negativos de la 
inmigración. Interpretación de la estadística en la 
consideración de la hoja de trabajo "la situación de la fuente en 
Alemania en 1946".</string>
          </description>
